meanings.definition: A person who uses a chisel to carve or shape wood or stone.
meanings.sent1: The skilled chisellers carefully carved intricate designs into the wooden sculpture.
meanings.sent2: The chisellers at the workshop were busy creating beautiful statues for the art exhibition.
meanings.sent3: The chisellers decided to have a friendly competition to see who could carve the tiniest details.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like chisellers, shaping his thoughts into a new perspective.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the chisellers at work echoed through the quiet studio.
